name: Lab Escape (itch) (CptNero)
description:
New features added:

- Added 2 new levels.

- Added a mini boss.

- Hold down shift to dash.

- Replaced the default pistol with a full auto shotgun.

Please note that there's a bug in the browser release where the camera keeps spanning left because of hwcdn taking control. This bug isn't present in the Windows and locally ran WebGL build
